page.title: 06FARMING 3
page.content: { SALMON FISHING On Friday the 17th of May John, James and I went to interview William Paterson. Our subject is salmon fishing and we found out the following information. The Patersons have been salmon fishing here since 1910 and William has been fishing since the age of 14. William's biggest catch in one day is 750 salmon. This year Patersons started fishing on the 14th of May which is later than usual.The usual time is the 11th of Feb .This year Patersons have 9 nets out two at Hilton and seven at the tennis courts. If you put them all in line they would measure almost a mile.Last year was the worst season ever recorded for salmon fishing.Patersons own 6 boats but will use only 3 this
